name: jingtum/jingtum-php-sdk
description: jingtum-php-sdk is a client-side PHP library for communicating with the Jingtum API/Tum/Websocket servers. It is used for building Jingtum applications. It provides networking layer APIs and necessary facilities for building and signing payments/orders, for communicating with the Jingtum network instance, and for submitting payments/order or querying transactions history from Jingtum blockchain platform.
